name: en-wikipedia_en_top1m_maxi
title: Wikipedia's 1 Million Top Articles
description: 1 Million articles from the world's largest encyclopedia, created, moderated, and edited by users for users.
extra_description:
Can be searched using any word(s) that appear in article titles (this is fast!)

Or, do a deep search using any keyword(s) that appear further down in the articles themselves (have patience, this takes time!)
